LanguageData.GR_AlphaGenetic.label: alpha genome
LanguageData.GR_AlphaGenetic.description: A payload of alpha animal genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 2 genome can only be used as primary genome.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via an alpha genome excavator from:
